history.content:
Don't expect any class to provide an alternate final exam time, although it's possible that they may accommodate you. If you choose to continue with that schedule, you should be prepared to take all your finals as is.

``````````````````````````````

In my experience, I haven't seen Berkeley Professors in any department adjust for finals unless the times actually overlap. Be prepared for a rough day.

-------

Almost assuredly they won't accomodate; a common schedule last year had 3 finals on the same day for like hundreds of students and they didn't accomodate.

Don't expect any class to provide an alternate final exam time, although it's possible that they may accommodate you. If you choose to continue with that schedule, you should be prepared to take all your finals as is.

``````````````````````````````

In my experience, I haven't seen Berkeley Professors in any department adjust for finals unless the times actually overlap. Be prepared for a rough day.

Don't expect any class to provide an alternate final exam time, although it's possible that they may accommodate you. If you choose to continue with that schedule, you should be prepared to take all your finals as is.

children.subject: Dude I should have checked this before………crap I am taking the same schedule :)

history.content:
Hey everyone,

If I continue with my intended schedule(CS61C, EE16B, and Data 8) I will have all three finals on Thursday next semester. This seems like a dreadful experience, so I was wondering if professors in the EECS/CS department usually make allowances for an alternate final time in this case?

Thanks!
history.subject: Do CS/EECS Professors usually make allowances for 3 finals on the same day?
